OpenCoarrays
============

# Available modules


The overview below shows which OpenCoarrays installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using OpenCoarrays, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load OpenCoarrays/2.8.0-gompi-2019b
```
